tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TransportationAnalysis (
  Date DATE,
  City VARCHAR,
  TransportMode VARCHAR,
  Distance FLOAT,
  TimeTaken TIME
)

CREATE TABLE transport_routes (
    route_id INT NOT NULL,
    city_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transportation_mode VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    route_distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
    route_duration FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    route_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    agency_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES transportation_agencies (agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_stops (
    stop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    stop_location GEOGRAPHY NOT NULL,
    route_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES transportation_routes (route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_agencies (
    agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_modes (
    mode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mode_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    mode_id INT,
    weekday_schedule VARCHAR(255),
    weekend_schedule VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    mode_id INT,
    on_time_rating FLOAT,
    efficiency_rating FLOAT
)
